ValidationRule.description: Once we select the call type after that description field cant be blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration),NOT( SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '999'),ISBLANK( Description ),NOT(ISBLANK( SCC_Call_Type__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( SCC_Call_Type__c ))) )
